video_prompt: A young anime woman with flowing reddish-pink hair gently applies lipstick, her purple eyes sparkling and smile subtly widening. Her left hand gestures delicately. Fairy lights twinkle softly, and natural light streams in, subtly shifting across the room. An orange tabby cat blinks and subtly twitches its tail while looking up at her. The scene conveys a calm, cozy, and domestic atmosphere with warm, dynamic lighting.
image_prompt:
Anime style, young woman with very long flowing reddish-pink hair, black bow (left side), large sparkling purple eyes, gentle smile, and blush. She wears a white collared shirt (rolled sleeves), dark vest, short pleated magenta skirt, black thigh-high stockings, and brown loafers.

Seated at a wooden desk, she holds a tube of lipstick (applying gesture), with her left hand delicately near her face. The desk has silver-knob drawers, neatly arranged cosmetic bottles, and a black calculator.

Behind her, a soft pinkish-peach wall is adorned with strung fairy lights. To the right, a large grid window streams bright natural light, with a pulled-back beige curtain and a lush green potted plant.

An orange tabby cat with white markings sits beneath the desk on a light rug, looking up intently.

The scene has a calm, cozy, warm, and domestic atmosphere.
